mapper.insert:
select homsitterlist_seq.nextval from dual
insert into homesitterlist (hsl_num,hsl_size,hsl_chkin,hsl_chkout,hsl_service_type,hsl_pet_age) values (#{hsl_num},#{hsl_size},#{hsl_chkin},#{hsl_chkout},#{hsl_service_type},#{hsl_pet_age})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM homesitterlist WHERE hsl_size = #{hsl_size} AND hsl_size = #{hsl_size} AND hsl_size = #{hsl_size} AND hsl_size = #{hsl_size} AND hsl_size = #{hsl_size} AND hsl_size = #{hsl_size}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM homesitterlist WHERE hsl_address LIKE '%서울%인천%경기%' OR hsl_address LIKE '%서울%' OR hsl_address LIKE '%인천%' OR hsl_address LIKE '%경기%') WHERE hsl_d_address LIKE '%강남구%'
